question:
16. A.....................works at a school.    17. How...............the weather today?
18. It.........................windy.
19. .................... does the sandwich tastes?
20. How....................your new gloves feel? 
21. I.......................lots of water.
22. We................biking with our friends yesterday it was fun.
23. Did They...............it?
24. There aren't.............eggs in the refrigerator.
25. There are............pickles in the jar.

ada pilihan nya tolong di pilihin mana yang benar?

pilihan nya di bawah ini ada:

how, Is , teacher, go, rode, do ,was,drank, some, any

pilihan nya ada di situ yaa
nanti kalo mau jawab dikasih nomer nomer nya biar aku ga bingung misal no 1. apa gitu 

ok aku butuh jawaban nya sekarang tolong bantu aku 

hub aku:081386733878​

answers.answer:
16.A teacher work at a school
17.How is the weather today?
18. It was windy
19. How does the sandwitch tates?
20. How is your gloves feel?
21. I drank lots of water
22. We go rode biking with our freind
23. Did they drank it?
24.There arent any eggs in the refrigerator
25. There are soem pickels in the jar
Thx kk maaf kalau salah ya.. :p

related_questions.question:
A fish live on the....
Tolong bantu jawab​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

water

sea

ocean

dead sea

lakes

Penjelasan:

intinya ikan hidup di dalam air brother

a fish lives on the…
artinya: “ikan hidup di…”

ikan hidup dimana? laut/danau/sungai/delta/kolam/muara

karena banyak banget kita pilih yang paling umum aja ya, laut

laut bahasa inggrisnya sea

jadi jawabanya…

“a fish lives on the sea”

related_questions.question:
Mata pelajaran    Kelas
Jumlah siswa
: Bahasa Inggris
: VII (Tujuh)
Direction
Complete sentence with use tobe, am are and is!
1. My mother...... busy
2. Some students...... absent today
3. ...... a student
4. Junior high School of three...... comfortable and clean
5. Stone...... hard​

4. Salah satu janji Yesus kepada para Rasul-Nya yang la utus untuk mewartakan Injil atau kabar    baik kepada semua bangsa, adalah
A. akan diberikan umur yang panjang
B. akan diberikan keturunan yang banyak
C. akan menyertai mereka senantiasa sampai akahir zaman
D. akan diberikan harta dan kekayaan.​

answers.answer:
Jawabannya C.

Semoga membantu dan semoga benar

Jawaban:

C.akan menyertai mereka senantiasa sampai akhir zaman .

related_questions.question:
4. Tito is in the library. His hobby is ....    a, singing
b. dancing
c. swimming
d. reading
molluan to the river to​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

D. reading

Penjelasan:

4. Tito ada di perpustakaan, hobinya adalah

d. membaca

Jawaban:

d. reading

library= perpustakaan.

Tito is in the library. His hobby is reading.

Tito berada di perpustakaan. Hobinya adalah membaca.

a, singing= bernyanyi

b. dancing= menari

c. swimming= berenang

semoga membantu!

related_questions.question:

B.	Children are not allowed to play around the area.

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

D. You have to be careful because children are playing there.
